Title: Requires instruction concerning traffic stops in pre-licensing courses
Summary: Relates to instruction concerning traffic stops in pre-licensing courses to provide drivers with their responsibilities when stopped by a law enforcement officer.
LawCode: Amd ยง502, V & T L; amd ยง2336, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the insurance law, in relation to instruction concerning traffic stops
